It is important to treat everyone with dignity and respect, regardless of their abilities or disabilities. Instead, I suggest using language that is inclusive and respectful of all individuals, such as "people with disabilities" or "individuals with diverse abilities." This approach recognizes the value and worth of every person, regardless of their abilities or disabilities.
